common.unknownErrorMessage: Detail of error message is not available

message.fetchCoinsDataError: Unable to fetch data about cryptoassets.
message.fetchCoinStatsError: Unable to refresh the price of cryptoasset
message.fetchBalancesError: Unable to fetch data about balances of currencies
message.fetchConversionRateError: Unable to fetch data about conversion rates of currencies
message.emailFormatError: Enter email address in correct format 'example@email.com'
message.passwordFormatError: Password must be at least 4 characters long
message.userLoggedOutInvalidToken: User was automatically signed-out -> token expired

NULL_OR_EMPTY.title: Empty Field
NULL_OR_EMPTY.message: Input field is null or empty.

INCORRECT_PASSWORD.title: Wrong Password
INCORRECT_PASSWORD.message: Provided password does not match user password.

USER_ALREADY_EXISTS.title: User Already Exists
USER_ALREADY_EXISTS.message: User with same username / email already exists.

USER_NOT_FOUND.title: User Not Found
USER_NOT_FOUND.message: User does not exist for provided username / email.

INVALID_JWT_TOKEN.title: Invalid Token
INVALID_JWT_TOKEN.message: JWT token has invalid structure or was expired.

ACCESS_DENIED.title: Access Denied
ACCESS_DENIED.message: User has insufficient access rights to perform the action.

AUTHENTICATION_GENERAL_FAILURE.title: Authentication Failed
AUTHENTICATION_GENERAL_FAILURE.message: Unable to authenticate the user (e.g. missing authentication token, etc.).

ENTITY_NOT_FOUND.title: Object not found
ENTITY_NOT_FOUND.message: The requested object was not found in the database.

EXTERNAL_API_ERROR.title: External API error
EXTERNAL_API_ERROR.message: An unknown error occurred while querying the external API.

CONVERSION_RATE_EXPIRED.title: Conversion rate expired
CONVERSION_RATE_EXPIRED.message: The validity of the conversion rate has already expired. A new rate needs to be requested.

INSUFFICIENT_BALANCE.title: Insufficient balance
INSUFFICIENT_BALANCE.message: The balance in the sold currency is insufficient to process the conversion.

CONVERSION_TRANSACTION_FAILURE.title: Conversion transaction error
CONVERSION_TRANSACTION_FAILURE.message: An error occurred while preparing or updating the conversion transaction.

CANCELLATION_TRANSACTION_FAILURE.title: Cancellation transaction error
CANCELLATION_TRANSACTION_FAILURE.message: The transaction cannot be cancelled! It has already been processed, cancelled, or an unknown error occurred during the cancellation attempt.

CONVERSION_SAME_CURRENCIES.title: Identical currencies
CONVERSION_SAME_CURRENCIES.message: The sold and bought currencies cannot be the same.

EXCHANGE_RATE_NOT_FOUND.title: Exchange Rate Not Found
EXCHANGE_RATE_NOT_FOUND.message: Exchange rate could not be loaded for requested pair of currencies
